Name: Risky Floors
About the game: A game in the rogue-like RPG genre adventure. You play as a knight exploring endless dungeons in search of treasures and dangers. The gameplay has a tactical turn-based type. Each character step is accompanied by a time step in the game. In the maze of rooms secret doors can be found behind which there is an even greater danger and the number of heroes' lives is limited. Good luck, warrior.
